channel.description: Recent content in State-affiliated media on CAMGDP

item.title: Sources: Informburo
item.description: Founded in 2015 and affiliated with 31st Channel television station, Informburo offers news coverage, informational and analytical materials.

item.title: Sources: TengriNews
item.description: Founded in 2016, TengriNews offers news coverage of current events in Kazakhstan and the world and a database of legislative documents.

item.title: Sources: Zakon.kz
item.description: Founded in 1999, Zakon.kz offers news coverage of current events in Kazakhstan, Central Asia, Russia, and the US, as well as analytical materials and interviews.
